AR & VR

I started to learn AR & VR development during my time working at UFOMAMMOOT. I worked on a series of small projects in order to study both technologies. I used development tools like Unity and WebGL to build both software and web based experiences. The following projects are only a few selected from many others I've worked on.

Virtual Reality

WebGL VR experience where the user is able to move inside the train on movement and look to the city through the window. For this project I had to set up the VR enviroment for the web, adjust the 3D objects to the camera and create a teleportation movement for the player inside the train.

Augmented Reality

For the realease of the new jearsey shirt from Arsenal together with Adidas we built an AR game and filter where the user could build a player with it's own face. I worked on developing some of the functionalities of this game.

hope to c u soon!
